channel.title: mvr on Guy Bianco IV
channel.description: Recent content in mvr on Guy Bianco IV

item.title: mvr update: new version and Chrome support
item.description: Last September, I started working on a browser plugin to navigate reddit. I had been using RES for a while now and really like their keyboard navigation. However, I don’t use 90% of the other features in RES (and don’t really think I would ever use most of them). While a powerful plugin, it’s a bit bloated for what I need. Every so often, I like to try out different browsers for a bit.
